name: Cincom Systems
overview:
Software to simplify business operations and customer communications.

We provide software to simplify and improve business operations and customer communications. Cincom enterprise technologies include contact center software, document automation software, manufacturing software, product configuration software, healthcare software, database management software and application development software. We are now in our 42nd year of leadership in the software industry. Our President, Thomas M. Nies, is the longest-serving active CEO in the software industry. Few other software companies can claim such leadership, longevity and contribution to the information systems industry. This success is a testament to our long-range thinking, significant investment in research and development, and commitment to our customer’s success.

milestones.description: Cincom Acquire Silver Sponsor of SAP Configuration Workgroup North America Conference, October 2-5, 2011, Marco Island, FL
